channel.title: [317] Castle wars
channel.description: hey im on a delta source and i need some help adding castle wars. The actually castles and everything are there but when i use ladders nothing happens or when i take from the stall i get nthing. please help. thanks

item.title: [317] Castle wars
item.dc:creator: @ultimatescape ultimatescape
item.description:
@ultimatescape wrote:

Maybe that’s because what you’re actually doing is coding a server, not playing RuneScape.

This is how it works on RuneScape:

Client --> sends packets <-- server

When your client sends packets to the server it makes the client do something based on the servers response.

Since you have nothing coded in your client for the response to the ladder click it will obviously return with the default (nothing).

Read full topic
